forgotPassword: If the account exists in our system, we will send an email with instructions on how to reset your password
resetPassword: Your password has been reset successfully

error.accessTokenDefault: There's been an error during the validation of your access token
error.accessTokenAccountInactive: Your account is no longer active
error.encryptedPayload: Your payload was not decrypted correctly
error.invalidLogin: There's been an error while attempting to login you in
error.invalidVerify: There's been an error with the verification token provided
error.invalidCreatePassword: There's been an error with the password provided
error.invalidCreateAccount: There's been an error while attempting to create an account
error.accountDisabled: This user is disabled, please contact support
error.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts, please try again later!
error.invalidParameters: There's been an error with your parameters
error.invalidEmailVerification: There's been an error during your email verification, please contact your representative
error.accountNotVerified: This user has not been verified yet
error.accountAlreadyVerified: This user has already been verified
error.accountInactive: This user is inactive, please contact support
